previous.excerpt: Covering 249 countries, Canitravel.net helps international travelers navigate Coronavirus restrictions worldwide. Whether you're looking to repatriate, meet your loved one, or find safe travel destinations, you can plan your next trip with confidence.
previous.title: Canitravel.net - Covid restrictions made simple – A new way to travel

localize.description: Canitravel.net覆盖249个国家，帮助国际旅行者了解全球范围内的冠状病毒限制。无论您是想回国、与亲人相聚，还是寻找安全的旅行目的地，您都可以放心地计划您的下一次旅行。
localize.tagline: Covid的限制变得简单--一种新的旅行方式

localize.description: Canitravel.net覆蓋249個國家，幫助國際旅行者瞭解全球範圍內的冠狀病毒限制。無論您是想回國、與親人相聚，還是尋找安全的旅行目的地，您都可以放心地計劃您的下一次旅行。
localize.tagline: Covid的限制變得簡單--一種新的旅行方式
